Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • tjc.model.Randomiser

  • public class Trade
extends AbstractTick
    Performs the tick actions for a trade model, inheriting from the AbstractTick class.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public int tick()
        Iterates a tick. Marks each power plant held by an agent as unused, distributes credits to the agents and initialises an Auction. Calls and returns the super method.
        Overrides:
        tick in class AbstractTick
        Returns:
        The value of the completed tick
